articles.title: KKR and GMP to launch rail leasing platform in Europe
articles.mainIdea: KKR and GMP to launch rail leasing platform in Europe
articles.summary: Leasing Life: KKR and GMP to launch rail leasing platform in Europe. As part of the arrangement, KKR will obtain a majority stake in GMP.

articles.title: Coty appoints Markus Strobel as executive chairman and interim CEO
articles.mainIdea: Coty appoints Markus Strobel as executive chairman and interim CEO
articles.summary: Retail Insight Network: Coty appoints Markus Strobel as executive chairman and interim CEO. Strobel arrives at Coty after more than three decades at P&G, where he most recently headed the company’s global skin and personal care division as president. Related tickers mentioned: BOSSY, PG.

articles.title: NBPE Announces November Monthly NAV Estimate
articles.mainIdea: NBPE Announces November Monthly NAV Estimate
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: NBPE Announces November Monthly NAV Estimate. THE INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN IS NOT FOR RELEASE, PUBLICATION OR DISTRIBUTION IN OR INTO AUSTRALIA, CANADA, ITALY, DENMARK, JAPAN, THE UNITED STATES, OR TO ANY NATIONAL OF SUCH JURISDICTIONS St Peter Port, Guernsey 23 December 2025 NB Private Equity Partners (NBPE), the $1.2bn1, FTSE 250, listed private equity investment company managed by Neuberger Berman, today announces its 30 November 2025 monthly NAV estimate. NAV Highlights (30 November 2025) NAV per share was $27.67 (£20.88), a USD tot Related tickers mentioned: NBPVF.

articles.title: If I Could Only Buy and Hold a Single Stock, This Would Be It
articles.mainIdea: If I Could Only Buy and Hold a Single Stock, This Would Be It
articles.summary: Motley Fool: If I Could Only Buy and Hold a Single Stock, This Would Be It. Berkshire Hathaway can help reduce the downside risk of your long-term investment portfolio. Related tickers mentioned: BRK.A.

articles.title: Coty Names P&G Veteran as Interim CEO Amid Beauty Shake-Up
articles.mainIdea: Coty Names P&G Veteran as Interim CEO Amid Beauty Shake-Up
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Coty Names P&G Veteran as Interim CEO Amid Beauty Shake-Up. Cosmetics giant Coty has appointed Markus Strobel as interim chief executive and board chair, effective Jan. 1. Related tickers mentioned: COTY, PG.
